name: (canceled fangame) Sugary Spire
description:
this was a pizza tower fangame, it was canceled due to the main dev experiencing lots of stress and getting fed up with drama/pizza tower, and other stuff as a whole. Please do not harass the devs to continue this. The assets made by the animator are open for free use here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1jxkIWA7zK-4PLTNIthFeLt0ofjOFHFLP/view?usp=shari...

Apologies to anyone who was hyped for this,, if someone wants to revive this project, contact the devs.
